Title: Fresh Flowers
Writer: Jennifer Ames, Steve Turner, Marisa Wegrzyn, David E. Kelley (created by), Jonathan Shapiro (created by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Nina Arianda, Ana de la Reguera, Tania Raymonde
Plot: When Billy learns the name of the real shooter, he has to turn to the FBI to help him bring his elusive suspect in for questioning.
